blogPost.excerpt: With Crove app you can create your repetitive business documents as intelligent templates that use variables and logical conditions.
blogPost.body: With Crove app you can create your repetitive business documents as intelligent templates that use variables and logical conditions.
blogPost.title: Crove - Automate your repetitive business documents
blogPost.author: Gourav Manchanda

localize.description: 通过Crove应用，您可以将重复性的业务文档创建为使用变量和逻辑条件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自动化您的重复性业务文件

localize.description: 通過Crove應用，您可以將重複性的業務文檔創建爲使用變量和邏輯條件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自動化您的重複性業務文件

previous.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
previous.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.

localize.description: Hyper是一款专为游戏玩家和动漫迷打造的动漫语音聊天应用。与人见面，语音聊天，不用担心露出真面目。我们给你提供绘画、语音聊天等工具。花费的时间越多，赚取的金币越多，可以获得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交网络为人们进入游戏和动漫。

localize.description: Hyper是一款專爲遊戲玩家和動漫迷打造的動漫語音聊天應用。與人見面，語音聊天，不用擔心露出真面目。我們給你提供繪畫、語音聊天等工具。花費的時間越多，賺取的金幣越多，可以獲得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交網絡爲人們進入遊戲和動漫。

next.excerpt: Without Community, There Is No Crypto. LunarCRUSH is a social listening platform for cryptocurrencies and helps investors make better decisions by tracking the community each cryptocurrency is building through beautiful dashboards and real-time data analysis.
next.title: LunarCRUSH - Social Listening for Cryptocurrencies

localize.description: 没有社区，就没有加密。LunarCRUSH是一个加密货币的社交聆听平台，通过精美的仪表盘和实时数据分析，跟踪每个加密货币正在建立的社区，帮助投资者做出更好的决策。
沒有社區，就沒有加密。LunarCRUSH是一個加密貨幣的社交聆聽平臺，通過精美的儀表盤和實時數據分析，跟蹤每個加密貨幣正在建立的社區，幫助投資者做出更好的決策。
